scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn submodule_copy && yarn build-html
scripts.setup: bundle install && git submodule update --init && git pull --recurse-submodules && yarn submodule_copy
scripts.submodule_copy: yarn submodule_copy_blockchain01 && yarn submodule_copy_blockchain02 && yarn submodule_copy_blockchain03 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib01 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib02 && yarn submodule_copy_contracts01 && yarn submodule_copy_contracts02 && yarn submodule_copy_relay01 && yarn submodule_copy_relay02 && yarn submodule_copy_relay03 && yarn submodule_copy_relay04 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib-docs01 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib-docs02 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib-docs03 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib-docs04 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib-docs05 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib-docs06 && yarn submodule_copy_clientlib-docs07
scripts.submodule_copy_blockchain01: cp submodules/blockchain/README.md docs/blockchain/repo/tlbc.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: blockchain' '---' '' | cat - docs/blockchain/repo/tlbc.md > temp && mv temp docs/blockchain/repo/tlbc.md
scripts.submodule_copy_blockchain02: cp submodules/blockchain/docs/BlockchainInfrastructure.md docs/blockchain/repo/BlockchainInfrastructure.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: blockchain' 'title: The Trustlines Blockchain' '---' '' | cat - docs/blockchain/repo/BlockchainInfrastructure.md > temp && mv temp docs/blockchain/repo/BlockchainInfrastructure.md
scripts.submodule_copy_blockchain03: cp submodules/blockchain/docs/DockerSetup.md docs/blockchain/repo/DockerSetup.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: blockchain' 'title: The Trustlines Blockchain' '---' '' | cat - docs/blockchain/repo/DockerSetup.md > temp && mv temp docs/blockchain/repo/DockerSetup.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib01: cp submodules/clientlib/README.md docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib/repo/clientlib.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib02: cp submodules/clientlib/docs/guides.md docs/clientlib/repo/guides.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' 'title: The Client Library' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib/repo/guides.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib/repo/guides.md
scripts.submodule_copy_contracts01: cp submodules/contracts/README.rst docs/contracts/repo/contracts_README.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: contracts' '---' '' | cat - docs/contracts/repo/contracts_README.md > temp && mv temp docs/contracts/repo/contracts_README.md
scripts.submodule_copy_contracts02: cp submodules/contracts/docs/deploy.md docs/contracts/repo/deploy.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: contracts' 'title: The Smart Contracts' '---' '' | cat - docs/contracts/repo/deploy.md > temp && mv temp docs/contracts/repo/deploy.md
scripts.submodule_copy_relay01: cp submodules/relay/README.rst docs/relay/repo/relay_server.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: relay' '---' '' | cat - docs/relay/repo/relay_server.md > temp && mv temp docs/relay/repo/relay_server.md
scripts.submodule_copy_relay02: cp submodules/relay/docs/RelayAPI.md docs/relay/repo/relay-api.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: relay' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/relay/repo/relay-api.md > temp && mv temp docs/relay/repo/relay-api.md
scripts.submodule_copy_relay03: cp submodules/relay/docs/RelayServer.md docs/relay/repo/running_trustlines_system.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: relay' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/relay/repo/running_trustlines_system.md > temp && mv temp docs/relay/repo/running_trustlines_system.md
scripts.submodule_copy_relay04: cp submodules/relay/docker/trustlines/README.md docs/relay/repo/trustlines_docker.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: relay' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/relay/repo/trustlines_docker.md > temp && mv temp docs/relay/repo/trustlines_docker.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib-docs01: cp submodules/clientlib-docs/md/async.md docs/clientlib-docs/repo/async.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib-docs/repo/async.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib-docs/repo/async.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib-docs02: cp submodules/clientlib-docs/md/deploy.md docs/clientlib-docs/repo/deploy.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib-docs/repo/deploy.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib-docs/repo/deploy.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib-docs03: cp submodules/clientlib-docs/md/deploymenttools.md docs/clientlib-docs/repo/deploymenttools.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib-docs/repo/deploymenttools.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib-docs/repo/deploymenttools.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib-docs04: cp submodules/clientlib-docs/md/development.md docs/clientlib-docs/repo/development.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib-docs/repo/development.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib-docs/repo/development.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib-docs05: cp submodules/clientlib-docs/md/installation.md docs/clientlib-docs/repo/installation.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib-docs/repo/installation.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib-docs/repo/installation.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib-docs06: cp submodules/clientlib-docs/md/introduction.md docs/clientlib-docs/repo/introduction.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib-docs/repo/introduction.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib-docs/repo/introduction.md
scripts.submodule_copy_clientlib-docs07: cp submodules/clientlib-docs/md/notes.md docs/clientlib-docs/repo/notes.md && printf '%b\n' '---' 'layout: clientlib' 'title: The Relay Server' '---' '' | cat - docs/clientlib-docs/repo/notes.md > temp && mv temp docs/clientlib-docs/repo/notes.md
scripts.clean: rm docs/blockchain/repo/*.md && rm docs/clientlib/repo/*.md && rm docs/contracts/repo/*.md && rm docs/relay/repo/*.md && rm docs/clientlib-docs/repo/*.md
scripts.deploy: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && git push && git checkout master
